auth.name: TokenType
auth.doc: An enumeration for different types of authentication tokens available

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this token type for identification. Not localized.

props.name: duration
props.doc: Duration that determines how long these tokens remain valid after issuing. None if these tokens don't expire automatically.

props.name: refreshedTypeId
props.doc: Id of the type of token that may be acquired by using this token type as a refresh token, if applicable

props.name: isSingleUseOnly
props.doc: Whether tokens of this type may only be used once (successfully)

combos.name: TypedToken
combos.doc: Adds type information to a token

combos.name: ScopedToken
combos.doc: Includes available scope links (ids) to an access token

combos.name: EmailValidationToken
combos.doc: A token with email validation information included

props.name: typeId
props.doc: Id of the token type applicable to this token

props.name: hash
props.doc: A hashed version of this token

props.name: parentTokenId
props.doc: Id of the token that was used to acquire this token, if applicable & still known

props.name: ownerId
props.doc: Id of the user who owns this token, if applicable

props.name: modelStylePreference
props.doc: Model style preferred during this session

props.name: expires
props.doc: Time when this token expires, if applicable
Time when this token was issued
Time when this token was revoked or replaced

props.name: isSingleUseOnly
props.doc: Whether this token may only be used once (successfully)

auth.name: Scope
auth.doc: Represents an access right requirement and/or category.

combo.name: TokenScope
combo.doc: An access scope that is tied to a specific access token

props.name: name
props.doc: Technical name or identifier of this scope

auth.name: TokenScopeLink
auth.doc: Used for linking scopes to tokens using many-to-many connections, describing what actions each token enables

props.doc: Id of the linked token
Id of the enabled scope

auth.name: EmailValidationAttempt
auth.doc: Represents an attempted email validation. Provides additional information to an authentication token.

props.doc: Id of the token sent via email

props.name: emailAddress
props.doc: Address to which the validation email was sent

props.name: resendTokenHash
props.doc: Hashed token which may be used to send a copy of this email validation. None if resend is disabled.

props.name: sendCount
props.doc: Number of times a validation email has been sent for this specific purpose up to this point.
Id of the user who owns this password

props.name: hash
props.doc: User's hashed password, including salt
